task.title: Task
task.closeAndStart: Close task and start a new one
task.delete: Delete Task (Shift + Click to skip confirmation)

onboarding: Your task list in this workspace is empty. Start by typing in a task below. Not sure how to begin? Read more about what Symbiote can do for you in the docs.
enhancePromptDescription: The 'Enhance Prompt' button helps improve your prompt by providing additional context, clarification, or rephrasing. Try typing a prompt in here and clicking the button again to see how it works.
addContext: @ to add context, / to switch modes
dragFiles: hold shift to drag in files
dragFilesImages: hold shift to drag in files/images

checkpoint.initializingWarning: Still initializing checkpoint... If this takes too long, you can disable checkpoints in <settingsLink>settings</settingsLink> and restart your task.

menu.restoreFilesDescription: Restores your project's files back to a snapshot taken at this point.
menu.restoreFilesAndTaskDescription: Restores your project's files back to a snapshot taken at this point and deletes all messages after this point.

instructions.wantsToFetch: Symbiote wants to fetch detailed instructions to assist with the current task

fileOperations.wantsToRead: Symbiote wants to read this file:
fileOperations.wantsToReadOutsideWorkspace: Symbiote wants to read this file outside of the workspace:
fileOperations.wantsToEdit: Symbiote wants to edit this file:
fileOperations.wantsToEditOutsideWorkspace: Symbiote wants to edit this file outside of the workspace:
fileOperations.wantsToCreate: Symbiote wants to create a new file:

directoryOperations.wantsToViewTopLevel: Symbiote wants to view the top level files in this directory:
directoryOperations.didViewTopLevel: Symbiote viewed the top level files in this directory:
directoryOperations.wantsToViewRecursive: Symbiote wants to recursively view all files in this directory:
directoryOperations.didViewRecursive: Symbiote recursively viewed all files in this directory:
directoryOperations.wantsToViewDefinitions: Symbiote wants to view source code definition names used in this directory:
directoryOperations.didViewDefinitions: Symbiote viewed source code definition names used in this directory:
directoryOperations.wantsToSearch: Symbiote wants to search this directory for {{regex}}:

mcp.wantsToUseTool: Symbiote wants to use a tool on the {{serverName}} MCP server:
mcp.wantsToAccessResource: Symbiote wants to access a resource on the {{serverName}} MCP server:

modes.wantsToSwitch: Symbiote wants to switch to {{mode}} mode
modes.wantsToSwitchWithReason: Symbiote wants to switch to {{mode}} mode because: {{reason}}

subtasks.wantsToCreate: Symbiote wants to create a new subtask in {{mode}} mode:
subtasks.wantsToFinish: Symbiote wants to finish this subtask
subtasks.defaultResult: Please continue to the next task.
subtasks.completionInstructions: Subtask completed! You can review the results and suggest any corrections or next steps. If everything looks good, confirm to return the result to the parent task.

shellIntegration.troubleshooting: Still having trouble? Click here for shell integration documentation.
shellIntegration.checkSettings: Check terminal workarounds in the settings page
shellIntegration.supportedShell: Make sure you're using a supported shell: zsh, bash, fish, or PowerShell

powershell.issues: It seems like you're having Windows PowerShell issues, please see this

autoApprove.title: Auto-approve:
autoApprove.description: Auto-approve allows Symbiote to perform actions without asking for permission. Only enable for actions you fully trust. More detailed configuration available in <settingsLink>Settings</settingsLink>.

announcement.title: ðŸŽ‰ Symbiote v1.0.0 Released
announcement.description: Symbiote is a fork of Roo Code with simplified installation and no telemetry.
announcement.symbioteFeature1: <bold>No Telemetry</bold>: Symbiote respects your privacy with all telemetry completely removed
announcement.symbioteFeature2: <bold>Simplified Installation</bold>: Works for all VS Code users without requiring Qdrant or Mem0
announcement.symbioteFeature3: <bold>Independent Development</bold>: Symbiote will develop independently while merging updates from Roo Code
announcement.feature1: <bold>Gemini 2.5 Flash Thinking</bold>: You can now use the thinking variant of Gemini 2.5 Flash and specify a thinking token budget
announcement.feature2: <bold>UI Improvements</bold>: The task header, chat view, history preview, and welcome view have been visually upgraded
announcement.feature3: <bold>Bug Fixes</bold>: More reliable diff edits & more

followUpSuggest.copyToInput: Copy to input (same as shift + click)

browser.rooWantsToUse: Symbiote wants to use the browser:
